page.title: 06A FARM LABOURER'S DAUGHTER.
page.content: Nicola is the daughter of Mr. Berry, a farm labourer employed on a farm in Whaley. Nicola is thirteen years old and attends Welbeck Hall of the Bolsover School. She gets up at 7.30 and gets washed, dressed and ready for school. She is brought to school by car and leaves home at 8.45am. During the day Nicola has four lessons with a lunch break from 12 0' clock until 10 past 1. She travels home by car, arriving at about 3.55pm. Her family has an evening meal when her father returns from work. During the evening there is homework to be done.
